com.github.codeteapot.jmibeans

Class PlatformAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.codeteapot.jmibeans.PlatformAdapter

  • public class PlatformAdapter
extends Object
    Adapter to interact with the platform by reacting to the events that occur on it.

    The access to the platform is abstracted through the definition of a catalog and the implementation of a session factory for the machines involved.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PlatformAdapter(PlatformEventSource eventSource, MachineCatalog catalog, MachineSessionFactory sessionFactory)
      Creates an adapter given the platform event source, and the catalog and session factory of machines.

      The platform context generated by this adapter.

      Keeps the current thread watching for infrastructure changes via the corresponding platform port.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PlatformAdapter

        public PlatformAdapter(PlatformEventSource eventSource,
                       MachineCatalog catalog,
                       MachineSessionFactory sessionFactory)
        Creates an adapter given the platform event source, and the catalog and session factory of machines.
        Parameters:
        eventSource - Source of events that occur on the platform.
        catalog - Catalog used to create the machine instances.
        sessionFactory - Implementation of the session factory for the machines.

    • Method Detail

      • getContext

        public PlatformContext getContext()
        The platform context generated by this adapter.
        Returns:
        The generated platform context.

      • listen

        public void listen(PlatformPort port)
            throws InterruptedException
        Keeps the current thread watching for infrastructure changes via the corresponding platform port.

        This is a blocking operation. Different ports can be listened on in different threads.

        Parameters:
        port - The platform port through which the target infrastructure is watched.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - In case of interrupting the thread in which the operation is executed.
